claim: Figure 1 below shows the plot of estimated power, and its 95% confidence interval, against B for values of the latter from 2 to 12.
title: FIGURE 1.
caption: Power to detect a 10% effect size of fertilizer treatment on grain Zn concentration. The gray band shows the 95% confidence interval for estimated power to detect the specified fertilizer effects for differing numbers of blocks per sub‐site. The central line is the estimated power

claim: The results are shown in Figure 2.
title: FIGURE 2.
caption: Power to detect a difference of 5 mg/kg between Lixisols and Vertisols. The gray band shows the 95% confidence interval for estimated power to detect the specified soil type effects for differing numbers of blocks per sub‐site. The central line is the estimated power

claim: Figure 3 shows the layout of plots in blocks for the Lixisol sub‐site at the Chitedze Agricultural Research Station.
title: FIGURE 3.
caption: Plot layout on the Lixisol sub‐site at Chitedze Agricultural Research Station using independent randomization within each of 10 blocks. Key: Zn1 = 1 kg/ha, Zn30 = 30 kg/ha and Zn90 = 90 kg/ha
